member.name: T:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork
member.summary: An abstraction of the SimpleML.BasicFeedForwardNeuralNetwork class, to facilitate mocking and unit testing.

member.name: M:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.InitialiseWeights
member.summary: Sets the weights in the network to small, random values.

member.name: M:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.Train(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Trains the network using the specified training data for the specified number of epochs.
member.param: An array containing the training data. The first dimension represents each individual training case, and the second dimension represents the input layer values.
An array containing the training target values (labels). The first dimension represents each individual training case, and the second dimension represents the output layer target values.
The learning rate to use during training.
The number of training cases to evaluate before updating the weights during each iteration through the training set.
The number of iterations through the complete training set to perform during training.
Whether to record the history of cost values.

member.name: M:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.Predict(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Predicts output values for the specified input data based on the current weights in the network.
member.param: An array containing the input data. The first dimension represents each individual data item, and the second dimension represents the individual input layer values for the data item.
member.returns: A 2 dimensional array containing the predicted values. The first dimension contains an entry for each individual item in the input data. The second dimension represents each output layer unit.

member.name: P:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.InputToHiddenLayerWeights
member.summary: The values of the weights between the input and hidden layers of the network. The first dimension represents the input units, and the second dimension the hidden units.

member.name: P:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.HiddenToOutputLayerWeights
member.summary: The values of the weights between the hidden and output layers of the network. The first dimension represents the hidden units, and the second dimension the output units.

member.name: P:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.HiddenLayerActivationValues
member.summary: The activation values of the hidden layer units.

member.name: P:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.OutputLayerActivationValues
member.summary: The activation values of the output layer units.

member.name: P:BackPropagationVisualization.Models.IFeedForwardNeuralNetwork.Cost
member.summary: The cross entropy cost using the current weight values.
